page.title: 02Wilton Farm
page.content:
One of the farms in{Greater Marlow}is {Wilton Farm.}We went to see the farm and Aaron's Dad let us have a ride on his Range Rover. The farm covers 350 acres and grows vegetables including sweetcorn, leeks, peas, spring greens cabbages and marrows.
Forty people work there, with an extra twenty taken on in the summer. Kevin's Dad works there as a lorry driver. He takes vegetables to markets in London and Bristol. They supply Tesco and Budgens and sell some of the vegetables in their own farm shop. They have fifteen tractors.
All the fields have names such as the Church Field (where the tithe or tenth part was given to the church), Jack's Field, Fern Field and the Old Dung Mine.
